:v-model.description: The controlled value of the menu item to activate. Should be used in conjunction with onValueChange.
:v-model.description_zh: 要激活的菜单项的受控值。应与 onValueChange 结合使用。

defaultValue.description: The value of the menu item that should be active when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the value state.
defaultValue.description_zh: 最初呈现时应处于活动状态的菜单项的值。在不需要控制值状态时使用。

:delayDuration.description: The duration from when the mouse enters a trigger until the content opens.
:delayDuration.description_zh: 从鼠标进入触发器到内容打开的持续时间。

:skipDelayDuration.description: How much time a user has to enter another trigger without incurring a delay again.
:skipDelayDuration.description_zh: 用户必须输入另一个触发器而不会再次产生延迟的时间。

dir.description: The reading direction of the menu when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 菜单的阅读方向（如果适用）。如果省略，则全局继承自 DirectionProvider 或采用 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。
